content:
Yes, those are the main steps you will need to follow to add a domain and SSL certificate to your Laravel project on DigitalOcean. Once you have completed these steps, your Laravel project will be accessible via the domain name you purchased, and the connection will be secure thanks to the SSL certificate.

Please note that these are just general instructions and the exact steps may vary depending on your specific server environment and the tools you are using. If you encounter any issues or have any questions, you can contact DigitalOcean support for help.
